thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Watertek Information Technology to inject capital of 50 mln yuan into two Beijing firms

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Watertek Information Technology to inject capital of 50 mln yuan into two Beijing firms

organizations.name: reuters) - beijing watertek information technology co ltd

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Beijing Watertek Information Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will inject capital of 30 million yuan into Beijing-based IT firm and raise stake to 15 percent from 0 percent
* Says it will inject capital of 20 million yuan into Beijing-based big data firm and raise stake to 64 percent from 60 percent
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/XfE4Sb ; goo.gl/VzG18D
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
